title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1503.5 - Spacing of sprinkler heads
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1503.5 - Spacing of sprinkler heads

State Regulations
(a) Sprinkler heads installed in new sprinkler systems and additional sprinkler
heads installed in existing sprinkler systems shall be located and arranged to
spray all parts of the area to be protected, including closets and alcoves
opening from such areas. (b) Spacing of sprinkler heads installed in new sprinkler systems shall conform to
the requirements of the generally accepted standards listed in the
appendix*. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1503.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
